p: We implemented Bayesian Inference (BI) and Maximum Likelihood (ML) phylogenetic analysis to reconstruct the relationships within the studied populations of P. guyannensis and P. cuvieri from northeastern Amazonia using the complete dataset. Sequences of the rodent species Trichomys apereoides (AY083332, AY083341) and Hoplomys (HM544128, NC020657) were obtained from GenBank and included in the analyses as outgroups.
